languages.text: "Сколь отрадно слышать эти слова, Ваша Светлость. Первый шаг к искуплению сделан — и это главное".
"It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."
languages.original_text: "Сколь отрадно слышать эти слова, Ваша Светлость. Первый шаг к искуплению сделан — и это главное".

traits.locale_text: "It is good to hear these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step to redemption."
"It is good to hear these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step to redemption."
"It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."
"It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."
"It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."
"It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."
"It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."
"It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."

languages.text: « Je suis heureux de vous entendre dire cela, Votre Seigneurie. Vous avez fait le premier pas, le plus important, vers la rédemption. »
languages.original_text: "It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis heureux de vous entendre dire cela, Votre Seigneurie. Vous avez fait le premier pas, le plus important, vers la rédemption. »

languages.text: «Me alegra oírle decir eso, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Ha dado usted un primer paso crucial en su camino a la redención».
languages.original_text: "It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegra oírle decir eso, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Ha dado usted un primer paso crucial en su camino a la redención».

languages.text: 「陛下、そのお言葉を聞けて嬉しいです。あなた様は、救済への最初であり、何より重要な一歩を踏み出されました」
languages.original_text: "It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、そのお言葉を聞けて嬉しいです。あなた様は、救済への最初であり、何より重要な一歩を踏み出されました」

languages.text: “很高兴听到您这么说，大人。您已经迈出了通往救赎的第一步，也是最关键的一步。”
languages.original_text: "It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."

traits.locale_text: “很高兴听到您这么说，大人。您已经迈出了通往救赎的第一步，也是最关键的一步。”

languages.text: "Es tut gut, Euch diese Worte sagen zu hören, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihr habt damit den ersten und wichtigsten Schritt in Richtung Erlösung getan."
languages.original_text: "It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."

traits.locale_text: "Es tut gut, Euch diese Worte sagen zu hören, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihr habt damit den ersten und wichtigsten Schritt in Richtung Erlösung getan."

languages.text: "Sizden bu sözleri duymak çok güzel {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Günahlarınızdan arınmak için ilk ve en önemli adımı atmış oldunuz."
languages.original_text: "It is good to hear you say these words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have taken the first and most crucial step toward redemption."
